subject: Player client executable on Android devices
description: As a Player, I want to be able to run the player client Android devices so that I can play the game on all my Android devices.

subject: Player login
description: As a Player, I want to login to get to the lobby the way as the observer so that I can decide whether to play or watch a game.

subject: Player has possibility to observe
description: As a Player, I want to have the same possibilities as the observer so that I can enter a game as an observer.

subject: Player makes move in game
description: As a Player, I want to be able to make moves in a game so that I can participate in a game as a player.

subject: Swap tiles as player
description: As a player, I want to be able to swap tiles from my hand with the deck, so that have new tiles on my hand in the next turn.

subject: Chat function for Player
description: As a player, I want to be able to chat with other players so that I can communicate to players.

subject: Player can only see corresponding tiles
description: As a Player, I want to see only the tiles on the board and those on my hand, so that I do not violate the rules of the game and see the tiles of the stack or other players.

subject: Remaining time for move
description: As a Player, I want to see the remaining time so that I can finish my turn on time.

subject: Game rules
description: As a Player, I want to play the game with the correct game rules.

subject: Draw tiles from the stack
description: As a player I want to draw tiles from a random stack at the beginning of each turn so that I always have theÂ configured number of tiles on hand.

subject: Connect observer to server
description: As an observer, I want to be able to login to the server, so that I can get to the lobby.

subject: Disconnect observer from server
description: As an observer, I want to be able to log out while I am in the lobby, so that I can stop my observing session.

subject: Observer select game category
description: As an observer, I want to be able to select categories of games so that I can observe any game I want.

subject: List of available games
description: As an observer, I want to see a list of all available games so that I have an structural overview of the games to observe.

subject: Join a game as observer
description: As an observer, I want to be able to join a game from a list of available games, so that I can observe them.

subject: Observer gets notification about final outcome of ended game
description: As an observer, I want to receive a review of the final outcome of an ended game, so that I know which player has won the specific game I observed.

subject: The board on which the tiles are laid
description: As an observer, I want to see all the tiles on the board, so that I can follow the game.

subject: Show hands of all players
description: As an observer, I want to see the tiles of all players so that I have a good overview of all the players.

subject: Show points of all players
description: As an observer, I want to see the current points of every player so that I can track which player is currently leading.

subject: Show remaining time for a move
description: As an observer, I want to see the remaining time for a move, so that I can feel the stress of the player whose turn it is.

subject: Player currently on the move
description: As an observer, I want to see which player's turn it is, so that I have a good overview of the game status.

subject: Observer leaves the current game
description: As an observer, I want to quit a game, so that I come back to the lobby to observe a new game.

subject: Load and save configurations
description: As a game host, I want to load and save configurations, so that I can use one configuration multiple times.

subject: Configure each game individually
description: As a game host, I want to configure each game independently, so that each game can be played with different settings.

subject: User interface for game host
description: As a game host, I want a user interface so that I can operate the server intuitively.

subject: Infinite number of games can be created
description: As a game host, I want to be able to create an infinite number of games, so that every player has the opportunity to participate in a game.

subject: List of logged in players
description: As a game host, I want a list of every logged in player so that I can assign players to upcoming games.

subject: Game host assign players to game
description: As a game host, I want to be able to assign every player to a game, so that he can play as soon as possible.

subject: Game host start games
description: As a game host, I want to start upcoming games.

subject: Game host pause and resume games
description: As a game host, I want to be able to pause and resume running games, so that I can respond to needed interruptions.

subject: Game host abort games
description: As a game host, I want to be to able abort games so that I can react when a game can not be played to the end.

subject: Create schedule of games
description: As a game host, I want to create a schedule of games so that I can run a tournament.

subject: Game host start tournaments
description: As a game host, I want to start upcoming tournaments, so that the players can play a tournament.

subject: Start and stop game server
description: As a game host, I want to start and stop a game server.

subject: See players assigned to a game
description: As a game host, I want to see players assigned to a game so that I have a better overview.

subject: See game run time as game host
description: As a game host, I want to see how long a game has been running so that I can estimate how long it will take.

subject: Chat function for Observer
description: As an observer, I want to be able to chat with other observers so that I can communicate to players who are not in the same room.

subject: Total time of a game
description: As an observer, I want to see the total played time so that I can see how long the game might take.

subject: See played tiles from each player
description: As an observer, I want to see all the already played tiles from each player.

subject: Engine participant performs correct moves on board
description: As an engine participant, I want to be able to put tiles on the board so that I can play against another players or engine participants.

subject: Start engine participant and log in to a server
description: As an engine participant, I want to start and log in to a server so that I can participate in games.

subject: Analyse board as engine participant
description: As an engine participant, I want to analyse the field so that I can compute my next move.

subject: User interface for observer
description: As an observer, I want a user interface so that I can use the client intuitively.
